data.Name: 1964 The Tribute
data.Bio: Misson: To actually recreate the 1964 Beatle invasion of America. They play a set of all early Beatle music. 1964 the Tribute is a Beatles' tribute band that was formed in 1982. They have performed over 2900 shows, released albums and released videos. Rolling Stone magazine has called 1964, "The best Beatles tribute ever." They were also featured in a PBS special of the same name; the soundtrack to which is listed in the discography. 1964 the Tribute have been featured on Entertainment Tonight Read more on Last.fm
